name: Angry Monkey Mud Toss Fight
description:
These monkeys are angry and are taking it out on one another!

The goal in this game, as in any throwing fight, is to hit your enemy as hard as you can with the mud!

It is very easy to play, just press hard on your monkey to give him more strength. When you are ready just release to throw!

The goal is to hit your monkey ""friend"" as much as possible!

Sounds easy? Prove it! Ready to have some fun?

Features include:

• Beautiful, fun graphics
• Smooth physics for nice gameplay
• Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
• Addictive gaming

Download right now!
